mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (id, parent_id, menu_name, menu_type, icon, order_num, perms, component, status) VALUES (#{param.id}, #{param.parentId}, #{param.menuName}, #{param.menuType}, #{param.icon}, #{param.orderNum}, #{param.perms}, #{param.component}, #{param.status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_menu
parent_id = #{param.parentId},
menu_name = #{param.menuName},
menu_type = #{param.menuType},
icon = #{param.icon},
order_num = #{param.orderNum},
perms = #{param.perms},
component = #{param.component},
`status` = #{param.status},
WHERE id = #{param.id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.perms, m.component, m.status, IF(COUNT(c.id) > 0, true, false) AS hasChildren, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_menu c ON m.id = c.parent_id WHERE m.parent_id = #{param.parentId} GROUP BY m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.perms, m.component, m.status, m.create_time ORDER BY m.order_num
